video_title: This Mindset Shift Can Change Everything
transcript:
if you struggle to deal with failure
here's a quick tip from a psychologist
be vigilant about your choice of
language as soon as you start using
statements that begin with I am things
like I'm a failure I'm a waste of space
it leads to these Global attacks on your
character and your self-worth and and
that triggers shame which stops you from
being able to just learn from it and
move on so instead separate the failure
from your self-worth always be clear
that one failure does not define you
